vote.title: Appointment of Patrick Dukes, Esq., Nationwide Mutual Insurance Company, Columbus, Ohio, to serve on the Property Maintenance Appeals Board replacing Matthew Zenko, with a new term expiration date of August 22, 2025. (resume attached).
